p: By the same method, six phenolic acids including, gallic acid, chlorogenic acid, caffeic acid, syringic acid, ellagic acid, and coumaric acid, in addition to three derivatives of phenolic acid including, caffeine, vanillin, and propyl gallate, were characterized from the inland plant sample. From all identified phenolic acids and their derivatives, vanillin and caffeic acid were characterized as major compounds in this sample with concentrations of 1284.61 and 452.87 µg g −1, respectively.
